##__The Application__

I built an application that provides an estimate of the annual real return for a stock market symbol entered by the user. The application is available at http://guycohn947.shinyapps.io/myapp .

##__Reproducible Pitch Presentation__

The presentation for the application is available at http://rpubs.com/guycohn947/regmeanapp .
